thread.title: Breathtaking view on Paris
thread.title_full: Breathtaking view on Paris - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: dedevoyage
title: Breathtaking view on Paris
text:
Good place to go for visit Paris, very close to Place Vendôme, 7 minutes walk from the Opera Garnier and the Louvre and 10 from the Palais Royal. Subway in front of the Hotel. The bar should be better, but until they don't do something better you have the Meurice next door.
Room Tip: The view on Musée d'Orsay, le Jardin des Tuileries and the Tour Eiffel!! Unique. See more room tips
